data.comment: The match is underway at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Kawasaki's Akihiro Ienaga gets in a shot on goal at Yanmar Stadium Nagai. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 4, Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Minami Tojo.
Jesiel (Kawasaki) strikes at Yanmar Stadium Nagai but his header is cleared.
In the minute 10, Minami Tojo awards Kawasaki a goal kick.
Jesiel (Kawasaki) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Corner awarded to Cerezo.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Kawasaki at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Free kick for Cerezo in the half of Kawasaki.
Kawasaki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 19, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in their own half.
Throw-in for Cerezo in the half of Kawasaki.
In the minute 21, Cerezo to take a throw-in in Kawasaki territory.
Minami Tojo awards the home team a throw-in.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 22, Ball safe as Kawasaki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Cerezo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kawasaki's half?
Minami Tojo signals a free kick to Kawasaki in their own half.
In the minute 26, Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
In Osaka, Cerezo push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Minami Tojo signals a free kick to Cerezo.
In the minute 30, Riku Matsuda (Cerezo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Cerezo have been awarded a corner by Minami Tojo.
Minami Tojo signals a Cerezo throw-in in Kawasaki's half.
In the minute 32, Minami Tojo signals a free kick to Kawasaki in their own half.
Throw-in Kawasaki.
Minami Tojo signals a Kawasaki throw-in in Cerezo's half.
Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Minami Tojo.
In the minute 37, Own goal in Osaka! Ayumu Seko scores in his own net to make it 0-1.
Cerezo's Bruno Pereira Mendes has run offside.
In the minute 41, Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
Cerezo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Kawasaki.
In the minute 43, Yasuto Wakizaka of Kawasaki smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Osaka.
Yu Kobayashi (Kawasaki) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half has come to a close in Osaka.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Osaka.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kawasaki have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 49, Cerezo have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in the half of Cerezo.
Goal kick for Cerezo at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
In the minute 54, Cerezo have a goal kick.
Eiichi Katayama of Cerezo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Kawasaki goal kick.
In the minute 56, Corner awarded to Cerezo.
Cerezo have been awarded a corner by Minami Tojo.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 59, Cerezo's Tatsuhiro Sakamoto breaks free at Yanmar Stadium Nagai. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Corner awarded to Cerezo.
Hiroaki Okuno (Cerezo) levels the match at 1-1 with a header.
In the minute 62, Riku Matsuda instrumental with a fine assist.
Cerezo needs to be cautious. Kawasaki have an attacking throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Osaka.
In the minute 64, Ryota Ohshima is replacing Yasuto Wakizaka for the away team.
Toru Oniki (Kawasaki) is making a second substitution, with Kaoru Mitoma replacing Manabu Saito.
Kawasaki are coming forward and Yu Kobayashi gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 66, Minami Tojo awards Cerezo a goal kick.
Throw-in for Cerezo at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 70, Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Minami Tojo signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 71, At Yanmar Stadium Nagai, Ryota Ohshima has been yellow-carded for the away team.
The home team have replaced Bruno Pereira Mendes with Shota Fujio. This is the first substitution made today by Miguel Angel Lotina.
The away team replace Kyohei Noborizato with Reo Hatate.
In the minute 74, Kawasaki make their fourth substitution with Shintaro Kurumaya replacing Ao Tanaka.
Kawasaki are whistled for offside.
Minami Tojo signals a throw-in for Cerezo, close to Kawasaki's area.
In the minute 76, Minami Tojo awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Kawasaki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Cerezo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kawasaki's half?
In the minute 77, Cerezo attack but Tatsuhiro Sakamoto's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for Kawasaki at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in their own half.
In the minute 77, Minami Tojo awards Cerezo a goal kick.
Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Minami Tojo.
Leandro Damiao is on a sub for Yu Kobayashi for Kawasaki.
In the minute 83, Goal! The away team take a 1-2 lead through Leandro Damiao.
Kawasaki take a comfortable 1-3 lead thanks to Kaoru Mitoma.
Great play from Miki Yamane to set up the goal.
In the minute 85, Free kick Kawasaki.
Goal kick for Kawasaki at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Cerezo make their second substitution with Yasuki Kimoto replacing Naoyuki Fujita.
Miguel Angel Lotina is making the team's third substitution at Yanmar Stadium Nagai with Yoichiro Kakitani replacing Hiroshi Kiyotake.
In the minute 86, Toshiyuki Takagi is on a sub for Hiroaki Okuno for Cerezo.
Cerezo have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Cerezo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Minami Tojo will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Cerezo.
Cerezo have been awarded a corner by Minami Tojo.
Throw-in high up the field for Cerezo in Osaka.
Cerezo have been awarded a corner by Minami Tojo.
Can Cerezo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kawasaki's half?
Full-time! The final score is 1-3.
Jun Nishikawa is replacing Tatsuhiro Sakamoto for Cerezo at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
